thread.title: The Regulars: Good mornings at Mel’s Drive-In
thread.title_full: The Regulars: Good mornings at Mel’s Drive-In - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Erin Brethauer
title: The Regulars: Good mornings at Mel’s Drive-In
text:
"Good morning!" sings waitress Marianne Hinge-Crossan on a recent Tuesday at Mel's Drive-In on Geary Boulevard. "Anywhere you like, you know it's good." Waitress Marianne Hinge-Crossan clears tables at Mel's Drive-In on Geary Boulevard. Waitress Marianne Hinge-Crossan clears tables at Mel's Drive-In on...
Ron Jones arrives at 9 a.m., the same time he strolls in nearly every morning. He sits in a booth by the front windows and orders a "Yuppie," a vegetable scramble with ground turkey.
